channel.title: RS Account creator
channel.description:
I didnt know where to post so i posted it here.
Basicly all it does is allow you to creat accounts easier on RS without so much clicking. It is very easy to customize so you never have to type a password all you have to do is change the password value to what you want your password to be.
Inspiration goes to Cody who made the first one I ever saw.
[URL=http://"http://www.uppit.com/dl/tQea0pI8"]Download :: I expect comments[/URL]
-----
Setting default password:
Find this code: [CODE]<input name="password1" maxlength="20" size="20" <input name="password2" maxlength="20" size="20" [/CODE]
Then add a value feild... [CODE]<input name="password1" value="password" maxlength="20" size="20" <input name="password2" value="password" maxlength="20" size="20"[/CODE]
And insert default password where it says value = password

item.title: RS Account creator
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

Akriam:

Were do you add the value field (sorry Im new to Java)

Open up the .java file (Sorry for my ignorace, I haven't downloaded it yet. I'm at school) And look for those using the search feature on either Notepad or your other Java dev tool. Then just add it how he said.

Should be around the top of the file, I'd assume.

item.title: RS Account creator
item.dc:creator: @bam_bam bam bam
item.description:
@bam_bam wrote:

I didnt know where to post so i posted it here.

Basicly all it does is allow you to creat accounts easier on RS without so much clicking. It is very easy to customize so you never have to type a password all you have to do is change the password value to what you want your password to be.

Inspiration goes to Cody who made the first one I ever saw.

Download :: I expect comments

Setting default password:

Find this code:

<input name="password1" maxlength="20" size="20" 
<input name="password2" maxlength="20" size="20"

Then add a value feild...

<input name="password1" value="password" maxlength="20" size="20"
<input name="password2" value="password" maxlength="20" size="20"

And insert default password where it says value = password

Read full topic
